appDesc.message: Add any web page to your wishlist on gogifts.me

abP1.message: A simple browser extension to add current tab page url to the GIFTSME wishlist. You can use either extension icon in the browser toolbar, context menu item or a keyboard shortcut (default is Ctrl+Shift+Y) to perform this action.

abP2.message: You need to have an active account on the site for extension to work properly.
